channel.title: Really minor typo when only the Sorcerer wins
channel.description:
#### What happened? The sorcerer, alone, has won the game.
https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/859488684126391013/8B2218294EB2F7B9C7A96242ADA8349A1853875B/ A small typo when Sorc wins. "The Sorcerer and Sorcerer Wins!", like there's 2 Sorcerers. I'm guessing it's because there were no Cult/Unseen left so only the Sorcerer could win, so instead of counting it like "The Sorcerer and Cult/Unseen Wins!" it's counting the Sorc twice.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Only say "The Sorcerer Wins!"
#### Steps to reproduce: 1. Have no cult/unseen remaining 2. Finish off all the BD as Sorc 3. Win 4. Victory screen has a typo
#### Comments: N/A

item.title: Really minor typo when only the Sorcerer wins
item.dc:creator: Tremmert
item.description:
What happened?

The sorcerer, alone, has won the game.

https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/859488684126391013/8B2218294EB2F7B9C7A96242ADA8349A1853875B/
A small typo when Sorc wins.
“The Sorcerer and Sorcerer Wins!”, like there’s 2 Sorcerers. I’m guessing it’s because there were no Cult/Unseen left so only the Sorcerer could win, so instead of counting it like “The Sorcerer and Cult/Unseen Wins!” it’s counting the Sorc twice.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Only say “The Sorcerer Wins!”

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Have no cult/unseen remaining
  2. Finish off all the BD as Sorc
  3. Win
  4. Victory screen has a typo

Comments:

N/A

Read full topic
item.source: Really minor typo when only the Sorcerer wins
